about.label: About
about.title: From Code to Cloud
about.hook: I’m done with 'it works on my machine'. I care about what runs in production—stable, measurable, and scalable.
about.description: Building code is one thing; shipping it is another. My focus isn't just writing logic, but ensuring it runs in the cloud with zero downtime. I design APIs and the ecosystem around them: containers, CI/CD pipelines, automated tests, reproducible environments, and observability baked in from day one. The result? Less friction, more confidence, faster shipping.

deliverable.title: Deliverables
deliverable.desc: CI/CD pipelines, environments (dev/staging/prod), automated testing & linting gates.

method.title: Methodology
method.desc: Short feedback loops, infrastructure as code, and observability by default.

services.label: Services
services.subtitle: Scope of Work
services.description: I lay the technical groundwork that empowers teams to ship faster without breaking things. This means versioned infrastructure, automated deployment pipelines, and full visibility into production systems.

workflow.label: Workflow
workflow.title: A Transparent Process
workflow.description: No black boxes. Just a battle-tested methodology to deliver high-quality software, sprint after sprint.

scoping.title: Discovery

planning.title: Blueprint
planning.desc: Simple architecture, tangible milestones, focusing on visible results first.

build.title: Build
build.desc: Clean code, rapid iterations, and fully reproducible environments.

delivery.title: Shipping
delivery.desc: CI/CD, critical testing suites, documentation, and smooth handover.

crm.title: CRM CLI
crm.description: A Python CLI tool for managing users, clients, and contracts. Features a strict MVC architecture, secure JWT authentication, and granular role-based access control (RBAC).

secure_url.title: Secure URL Analyzer
secure_url.description: Containerized sandbox for analyzing potentially malicious URLs without risk to the host. Hardened security using Docker isolation layers and advanced phishing detection patterns.

social.title: Enterprise Social Network
social.description: Internal social platform for corporate environments. Handles auth, real-time posting, and user interactions. Built with a React frontend and a robust Node.js backend.

scraping.title: Data Pipelines & Scraping
scraping.description: Multiple web scraping engines (books, corporate data) enriched via external APIs. Focus on automated data extraction, cleaning, and structuring for downstream integration.
